select distinct stu_id,stu_name,nik_name from v_info_lesson
substring(schedual_date, 1, 4) = #{year}
and del_flg = 0
order by stu_name

SELECT main.*, CASE WHEN sub.lesson_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_from_picese_lsn FROM v_info_lesson main LEFT JOIN (
SELECT DISTINCT lesson_id FROM t_info_lesson_pieces_extra_to_sche ) sub ON main.lesson_id = sub.lesson_id
substring(schedual_date, 1, 4) = #{year}
and del_flg = 0
order by stu_name, schedual_date desc, lesson_id desc, subject_sub_id desc, lesson_type

select distinct stu_id,stu_name,nik_name from v_info_lesson
scanQR_date is not null AND lesson_type = 2
AND substring(schedual_date, 1, 4) = #{year}
order by stu_name

select lesson_id ,stu_id ,subject_id ,subject_sub_id ,stu_name ,subject_name ,subject_sub_name ,class_duration ,lesson_type ,schedual_date ,scanQR_date ,lsn_adjusted_date ,extra_to_dur_date ,memo from v_info_lesson where substring(schedual_date,1,10) = #{schedualDate} or substring(lsn_adjusted_date,1,10) = #{schedualDate}

SELECT main.*, CASE WHEN sub.lesson_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_from_picese_lsn FROM v_info_lesson_include_extra2sche main LEFT JOIN (
SELECT DISTINCT lesson_id FROM t_info_lesson_pieces_extra_to_sche ) sub ON main.lesson_id = sub.lesson_id WHERE main.stu_id = #{stuId} AND substring(main.schedual_date,1,4) = #{year} AND main.scanQR_date is not null;
mapper.update: update t_info_lesson Set scanQR_date = NULL where lesson_id = #{lessonId}
update t_info_lesson Set lsn_adjusted_date = NULL where lesson_id = #{lessonId}
update t_info_lesson Set memo = #{memo} where lesson_id = #{lessonId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_info_lesson ( lesson_id, subject_id, subject_sub_id, stu_id, class_duration, lesson_type, schedual_date, scanQR_date, lsn_adjusted_date, extra_to_dur_date ) values ( #{lessonId}, #{subjectId}, #{subjectSubId}, #{stuId}, #{classDuration}, #{lessonType}, #{schedualDate}, #{scanQrDate}, #{lsnAdjustedDate}, #{extraToDurDate} )
